lg.l: This is a symphony of ordinary life
Nothing too grandiose or too loud
This is the story of ordinary men
Underachievers filled with pride
And the words you hear
Say what they mean
And nothing more then that
And there are no twists
Or tongue in cheeks
And the tune is plain and soft
This is a symphony of an ordinary day
nothing really happens most the time
This is a symphony of moments lost in life
That always seem to slip our minds
And it's a celebration
Of simplicity
It's a whisper in a noisy restaurant
It's an understatement
filled with love for life
It's a symphony of ordinary times
